page.title: 10GARDEN CENTRE-DERWENT VALLEY
page.content: The Nursery is situated on the busy Lintzford Road about three quarters of a mile outside Rowlands Gill village.It has been a nursery garden for thirty-four years and consists of three and a half acres of land with four green-houses. The Nursery yields a varying selection of bedding plants, such as primulas, marigolds, petunias, tagetes and many more, as well as growing strawberries and raspberries which are sold to the public on a "pick your own" basis. The Nursery has one full-time employee and she is the wife of the owner. The owner himself works part-time at his Nursery Garden as well as holding down a full-time job elsewhere. They can earn about Â£120 per week. They lead a very busy life.
